title: Mass. police officer placed on leave following high-speed, head-on collision, chief says
author: Heather Alterisio
bullets: Local News The off-duty officer could face charges including reckless operation of a motor vehicle, a marked lanes violation (two counts), and speeding.
A Massachusetts police officer was placed on administrative leave pending an investigation into a multi-vehicle crash this weekend in which speed was allegedly a factor.

title: Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about the chances of snow this weekend
